alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 17 at 1:45PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A SNOW SQUALL WILL AFFECT PARTS OF SOUTHERN WASHINGTON AND BENNINGTON COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A snow squall accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 145 PM EST, a snow squall was near Fort Edward, or 8 miles southeast of Hudson Falls moving east at 35 MPH. THIS SQUALL WILL BE NEAR... Salem around 200 PM EST. Arlington around 215 PM EST. Manchester and Manchester Center around 220 PM EST. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this squall. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
